en: Customer: I need to link the Vieira e Filhos to my account. Customer: How can I do it? Customer: sabrina98@goncalves.com Customer: 23/12/6445918 Customer: Logistics and Supply Chain Management Agent: Hello João Vitor da Mata! Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: You can do it from your Vieira e Filhos account, let me send you the steps Agent: 1 Agent: Go to https://www.viana.br/. Agent: 2 Agent: Click Sign In at the top of the screen. Agent: 3 Agent: Sign in to your account using your Vieira e Filhos credentials. Agent: 4 Agent: Click My Account at the top of the screen. Agent: 5 Agent: Click Account Settings. Agent: 6 Agent: Sign-In Options Agent: 7 Agent: Look for the Sign-in option you want to link and link it. Customer: When I click on My account, the Account Settings option does not appear Agent: What options do you see? Customer: The page disappeared. Customer: Now, when I type https://www.viana.br/, it goes straight into Vieira e Filhos Customer: Vieira e Filhos Agent: Yes, we are Vieira e Filhos Customer: In the left corner there has "Sign in" and not my account Agent: Please sign in to your account Customer: Here's the information: We can't find an account with this address......Check if you typed it correctly Agent: Can you please tell me what login option are you using? Customer: How so? Agent: when you login you can choose, Vieira e Filhos, Vieira e Filhos , Vieira e Filhos  to sign in. Agent: can you please tell me witch one are you using? Customer: Vieira e Filhos Agent: Your account doesn't have this login option, please try with the Vieira e Filhos option Customer: How can I do this? Agent: Click on more sign in options and choose Vieira e Filhos Customer: Here's the following message: To keep your Vieira e Filhos account safe, we've locked you out after five failed attempts at signing in. Customer: Use the Forgot Password link below to reset your password, then try again. Agent: Let me send you the reset email Customer: OK. Agent: Sent, please help me review your email and change the password Customer: There came a link for me to log in. Customer: Is that right? Agent: Yes, please click on that Agent: How is it going? Customer: OK. Customer: I created a new password and this message came: We did not find an account with this email address or password. Customer: Make sure you typed correctly. Agent: Thank you, and are you using the Vieira e Filhos login option? Customer: That's right Agent: Please help me trying from another browser or incognito mode Agent: How is it going? Customer: Ok, I managed to log in. Customer: Phew!! Customer: Now I am in account settings. Agent: Perfect Customer: What about now? Agent: 4 Agent: Click My Account at the top of the screen. Agent: 5 Agent: Click Account Settings. Agent: 6 Agent: Sign-In Options Agent: 7 Agent: Look for the Sign-in option you want to link and link it. Customer: Next to Livraria Cultura, do I click on "Link this account"? Agent: Yes, please click in there, it will ask for your Vieira e Filhos accoutnt Agent: account* Customer: It returned to Vieira e Filhos and Login. Customer: When I clicked on login there was the message: We did not find an account with this email address or password. Customer: Make sure you typed correctly. Agent: Please help me trying again Customer: I repeated the "Link this account" steps beside Vieira e Filhos and this message always comes up. Customer: Above Agent: And are you able to login to Vieira e Filhos? Customer: How so? Customer: Yes, normal Agent: What I can do it's to escalate so our team can review but I will also suggest for you to contact Vieira e Filhos as well. Customer: I already contacted Vieira e Filhos and she tried and said that the problem is with Vieira e Filhos and that I should get in touch with you...it's hard, huh? Agent: I will escalate to see what our team can do,  due to Vieira e Filhos having another system there is only so much we can do from our end but we will update you via email ok? Customer: ok Agent: Thank you! Agent: Is there anything else I can help you with in the meantime? Customer: Yes. Customer: Solve the problem Agent: We will review and see what else can we try on our end,  is there anything else I can help you with in the meantime? Agent: Unfortunately due to quality purposes, I will have to close this chat if I don’t receive a response in 2 minutes. Customer: ok Agent: If you have any more issues or questions, do not hesitate to contact us again. Agent: Thank you for contacting Vieira e Filhos, it was my pleasure to assist you today. Agent: I hope you have an excellent day.

en: Customer: My Moraes doesn't work, I put it to load but it doesn't turn on.  Customer: The model is Moraes, where can I get assistance?  Customer: gustavo30@yahoo.com.br Customer: I don't have this information, I've never used Moraes, I won it but it doesn't work  Agent: Hi Sr. Daniel Martins, Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: One moment please, I'll get your details. Customer: OK. Agent: Sr. Daniel Martins, if I understand correctly the device is not charging anymore? Customer: from what i realized, yes  Customer: I put it on the charger, both on the pc and on the socket, but no light turns on and it doesn't charge  Customer: no* Agent: I see, Sr. Daniel Martins did you tried other UBS cables? Agent: Other USB cables, or another connection? Customer: Yes, but doesn't work Customer: Which other connection, which type? Customer: Need to be some cable in particular? Agent: I see, no Sr. Daniel Martins I mean to another connection to the wall Customer: Sorry, I don't understand Agent: Sorry Sr. Daniel Martins, my fault. Agent: Did you tried with computer too, right? Customer: Right Agent: Ok does the light turn on, or device is complete off? Customer: The light does not turn on Agent: Got it, Sr. Daniel Martins we are going to try a reset on eReader. Agent: Please follow the steps below: Hold the power button for 15 seconds. Agent: Wait 5 seconds. Agent: Hold the power button for 5 seconds to turn it back on. Customer: My Moraes is the model Moraes Touch N905C, it doesn't have an on-off button, it's a different button to run to the side  Agent: I see, Sr. Daniel Martins we deeply apologize this  inconvenience. Agent: On what date you purchased the device? Customer: My God, it's been a long time Customer: Is there a place to service the device?  Agent: Unfortunately not at the moment Sr. Daniel Martins. Agent: I am really sorry about your device. Agent: You have been a great customer for us  so I get for you a discount in case you want to get another device. Agent: Se estiver interessado, segue abaixo as opções disponíveis: Agent: a) Desconto de 20.00 € num Moraes Agent: b) Desconto de 20.00 € num Moraes Libra H2O Preto Agent: c) Desconto de 20.00 € num Moraes Libra H2O Branco Agent: d) Desconto de 40.00 € num Moraes Forma 8GB Agent: e) Desconto de 10.00 € num Moraes Forma 8GB Customer: Is my Moraes still online? Customer: Do you still manufacture? Agent: Moraes touch is no longer manufactured Customer: Is there no place that does maintenance?  Agent: Unfortunately not Sr. Daniel Martins. Agent: I am really sorry about this. Customer: I understand Customer: Is there no maintenance only for this model or for any of them? Agent: Not Sr. Daniel Martins, at the moment we don't have authorized centers to fix devices. Agent: We deeply apologize this inconvenience. Customer: and still you suggest that I buy another one?  Agent: If you want, we are pleased to offer you a discount in case you want another device to be purchased on our Moraes store. Customer: for a product that doesn't have assistance if I need it? Agent: Sr. Daniel Martins, we deeply apologize the inconveniences. Agent: We really want to help you. Agent: We are happy to provide the discount in case you want it. Customer: I understood, thank you very much for the information. Customer: Good evening Agent: Thank you for contacting Moraes, it was my pleasure to assist you today. Agent: I hope you have an excellent evening.

en: Customer: My Pires Almeida e Filhos screen is turning off  Customer: eduardanogueira@carvalho.com Customer: I think it's 1 year  Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Customer: Thanks. Agent: What problem is your eReader having? Customer: His screen is turning off, everything on it is funky but I can't read anything on it  Agent: Have you charged it's battery recently? Customer: Yes it always gets loaded I never let it unload or dropped it  Agent: Ok, thank you. Agent: How does the screen of the eReader look currently? Customer: I left it in factory mode to see if it would come back but the letters are so faded that I can't even read properly Agent: Ok, please let's try this first Agent: 1 Agent: Hold down the power button for 15 seconds and release it. Agent: Wait 5 seconds Agent: 2 Agent: Press the power button once more firmly to reboot the device. Customer: I've done it Customer: The screen is the same  Agent: Does the screen react to touch? Customer: What do you mean? Agent: Does the screen respond when you touch it, or is it completely frozen? Customer: It responds normally the only problem is that the letters and images are practically erased  Customer: Hi Agent: Thank you. Agent: Could you please connect it to the computer and see if the computer detects it? Customer: Yes. Agent: does the computer detect it? Customer: Yes. Agent: Ok, thanks. Agent: Please disconnect it. Agent: We will try something. Agent: A manual reset Agent: do you have any external books in it? Customer: OK Customer: No Agent: Ok, you only have Pires Almeida e Filhos books? Customer: Yes. Agent: Ok, please follow these steps: Agent: 1 Agent: If possible, turn off your eReader. Agent: 2 Agent: Insert a paper clip into the small hole beside the Micro USB slot and push gently. Agent: You'll feel a click and your eReader will reset itself. Agent: 3 Agent: When you see square icons on the screen, insert a paper clip into the small hole beside the Micro USB slot and push gently. Agent: 4 Agent: Repeat step 3 two more times. Agent: Your eReader's screen will turn black, and show a Critical error message. Agent: Don't worry, this is normal. Agent: 5 Agent: Tap the check mark icon at the bottom of the screen to reset your eReader. Agent: You'll see a Restoring message on the screen. Customer: I did as you said but nothing appears.  Agent: Did you complete all the steps? Customer: Yes. Agent: Ok, Agent: How does the screen look after that? Customer: It's like it turned off  Customer: But you can see the books I still have  Customer: You can even see it little clearly written "off"  Agent: Ok, if to turn it on, do you see your books normally? Customer: It's not turning on I think the screen stuck  Agent: Could you onnect it to a charger and try to turn it on again? Customer: It's not turning on  Agent: Please leave it connected for a couple minutes and try again Customer: OK Customer: He did not return Agent: Please follow the procedure again Customer: Didn't turn on and continues with a very light background showing the books  Customer: Is there anything else we can do besides what you're talking about?  Customer: Because it only had the screen with the letters and images half off now after I did what you said he no they're not even calling  Agent: Is it still working? Agent: Can you still open your books? Customer: No, now nothing is working  Agent: /Is it giving you an option to set it up? Agent: how does the screen look? Customer: It's as if it had a screen saver, it doesn't come out of it, it appears that it's off but it shows the books well and it's off but I can't move anything  Agent: By any chance do you have the Pires Almeida e Filhos desktop app installed in your computer? Customer: Now he's heating up a lot Customer: Yes. Agent: Ok, please open the Pires Almeida e Filhos app in your computer and sign into your account Customer: Would you have any technical assistance in SP?

en: Customer: Good evening! Customer: I have a Barbosa da Conceição S/A, how long do I have to press the on/off button for my device to turn off completely? Customer: wazevedo@hotmail.com Customer: I don't have any purchases made.  Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Customer: I just received my device today  Agent: if you tap the power button you will put it on sleep mode Agent: press and hold for less than 10 seconds to power it off or you will perform a manual reset Customer: But sleep mode uses a lot of battery.  Customer: When I first turned it on it was 59% and now it's only 39%  Customer: I've tried faster what you told me but in none of the times it turned off.  Customer: just went into suspension  Customer: I bought this device because I always heard about the battery life Agent: yes battery durabillity is large with ereaders Customer: Is it possible that there is something wrong? Agent: you hav enot charged the ereader for at least 4 hrs on the first use Customer: I did not charge, I just called the computer to import the books. Agent: that was important step to do with every device, you have to fully charge it before using it Customer: Before using, I read the manuals. Customer: And neither in the manual nor on the Internet I found anything on this subject.  Agent: i repeat, that is a mandatory step to do with every device, not only for ereaders, the first charge will guarantee a long live battery Customer: I believe so, but as I said, nowhere did this information appear.  Agent: well, is to late for that Customer: Sorry but I didn't understand  Agent: could you turn off the ereader? Customer: I can't. Customer: I charge it until it supposedly says it's off and nothing happens.  Customer: Again, it only goes into sleep mode.  Agent: hold the power button Customer: How long? Agent: until it let you know is pawering off Customer: But I've told you that it doesn't happen Customer: It's the seventh time I've done this and it just goes into suspension  Agent: perform a manual reset then Customer: How? Customer: And the battery issue?  Customer: And the problem with the battery? Customer: Will I run out of my books?  Agent: you will have to re add them back Agent: you can recover the Barbosa da Conceição S/A automatically Customer: What about the battery? Agent: I do not understand? Customer: The problem with the battery that I mentioned at the beginning Agent: there is no problem,  you probably have shortened the battery life, that is all Customer: How so? Agent: when you did not fully charge it Agent: the first time Customer: But you still don't understand that none of this is mentioned in the manuals and nowhere at all? Agent: but the battery durability should remain the same Agent: I repeat, that step must be done with every single device Agent: i am really sorry you were not aware of the importance of this step Customer: If it's that important, it should be in the manual. Agent: but that does not have nothing to do with the battery durability per charge Agent: i mean that your battery will stop charging correctly in a few years Agent: but the battery performance per charge will remain the same Agent: it can last weeks depending of the usage Agent: of course sleep mode with wifi enable will consume much more battery Agent: i recommend you to disable wifi when you are not using the device or while you are reading, turn it on when you want to sync the ereader Customer: So basically I paid for a device that supposedly has a lot of battery life and that because it didn't charge the initial 4 hours it lost that capacity???  Customer: Can it take weeks??? Customer: The device is new. Customer: And as I said, it came with 59% battery (was turned on at 1pm) and now it's past midnight and it's only 37% and I haven't even used it, it's always been in sleep mode.  Customer: I have already reset to factory settings.  Customer: Continue without turning off  Agent: ok good Agent: set up through computer Customer: I loaded more than 8098 seconds and nothing appeared, it just went into sleep mode about 5 seconds after loading.  Customer: Otherwise, nothing happened  Customer: One way or another, it doesn't turn off  Customer: Tomorrow I will contact the store where I bought it and ask for a new device or a refund.  Customer: Good evening!

en: Customer: Good Morning! Customer: In the physical store of Costa I asked if I could offer ebooks, they said yes, just buy on the site you would receive a link and then send the link to the person.  Customer: But from what I understand that doesn't happen.  Customer: I just bought an ebook and I think it's just associated with my account, right?  Customer: What is the way to offer this ebook to someone else?  Customer: Ana da Conceição, Customer: Ana da Conceição Customer: cbarbosa@pereira.net Customer: January 9, 80901 Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Customer: Good morning Ana da Conceição Customer: The book is a gift not for me. Customer: How can I give it to whoever I want to give it to without it being in my library?  Customer: Is it possible? Agent: You wanted to send a book to someone else as a gift, correct? Customer: Yes that's right Customer: I had bought a physical one from Costa and the person asked to exchange it for an ebook. Customer: At Costa I returned it and they said to buy on the website that a link would be issued to download the book and just send the link to the person who wanted to give the ebook Customer: But that's not quite what happened. Customer: Or I don't understand anything about it. Customer: Or both lol Agent: I understand! Agent: I want to share with you that, die to copyright protection, we don't have a way to transfer books between accounts, Agent: The book is located under the acc you used to purchase it. Customer: So there is no way to offer it? Agent: We usually recommend to send Costa cards for you to send books as a gift. Agent: Or something we can do, is that I process a refund for you as store credit for this book, Customer: But Costa cards are just store cash cards aren't they?  Agent: and I can transfer it to the account you wanted to send the book, so this person can use the store credit on the correct account, to purchase the book. Customer: In this case, I prefer only to return the money since I will not use the book and the person does not have access.  Customer: The purchase was a mistake. Customer: I didn't even open the ebook as you can probably see in the history.  Customer: In this case, I would appreciate the return to the same payment method  Agent: And I completely understand you. Agent: Due to the misunderstanding, I'm absolutely going to process a refund for you. Customer: Thank you very much Ana da Conceição Customer: Thank you very much Ana da Conceição Agent: It's a pleasure for me! Agent: I will escalate your case to our refunds department to process your refund, please wait to be contacted by our refunds team shortly for updates and confirmation of the refund. Agent: Meanwhile, is there anything else I can help you with? Customer: That was all. Customer: Thank you very much. Customer: Will the contact be via email? Agent: It's correct, directly to the email address that you registewred for this interaction. Agent: Is this suitable for you? Customer: Yes, but, if it is necessary regarding this process, I can also be contacted at the +55 81 9709 5084 number Agent: Thank you so much! Agent: I do appreaciate your information! Agent: Do you have any other question? Customer: No Customer: That's all Customer: Thank you again Agent: You're welcome! Agent: And Thank you for contacting Costa, it was my pleasure to assist you today. Agent: I hope you have an excellent day!

Customer: The goal is this, Agent: You need to choose "Continue with da Costa", a pop-up screen will appear and, when prompted, and use your  da Costa account's credentials (this option should be used to sign in to all of your devices and at the da Costa website). Agent: You can read a da Costa eBook on many different devices including your da Costa and da Costa computer and laptop, smartphones, and tablets using the free da Costa App, which enables your devices to read the eBook formats and allows you to change Font type and size, change different front light appearances for best day and night reading, share quotes on da Costa, make annotations. Agent: You can carry all of your books on all your devices to read them anywhere, any time. Agent: Download the free da Costa in the da Costa for da Costa Devices at  https://nascimento.br/ Agent: Download the free da Costa App in the da Costa for Android devices at https://nascimento.br/ Agent: Download the free da Costa App for PC/da Costa Desktop and Laptop computers (da Costa, da Costa, da Costa), at  https://nascimento.br/ Agent: da Costa and audiobooks are nontransferable and cannot be shared, sent, copied, recorded or printed. Agent: These restrictions are imposed by authors and publishers themselves, to prevent the unauthorized distribution of their books. Agent: The only option available is to let your father use your da Costa account to read or listen to them on any device by signing in to your da Costa account; you may delete or add again your payment information anytime. Customer: Okay, but I needed a way to access it Customer: through log in Customer: for my account with a password and my associated email. Agent: 9 Agent: Under the My account tab, on the right under "Preferences and Personalization" enter your Name and date of birth. Agent: 10 Agent: Click the Payment Information tab and enter your Billing address (Country, address, postal code, phone number). Agent: 11 Agent: Once completed, click the "Save"  button to keep your changes. Customer: and it's not possible, for example, I managed to log in as usual. en: Customer: I can't access the books I bought Customer: luana70@ig.com.br Customer: I bought them through Farias, and I can't access them Agent: Hello Bianca Ribeiro! Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: Can you please tell me what is the title of the missing books? Agent: Bianca Ribeiro? Agent: Are you still with me? Customer: A coragem de ser imperfeito Agent: I see, can you please tell me more details on the problem you're having? Agent: Is it missing? Agent: Are you seeing an error message? Customer: I can't link the Farias account with the Farias Agent: I see, can you please tell me in what app or eReader model is this happening? Agent: And are you seeing an error message? Customer: I am using a mobile Farias Customer: Yes, it says it's having problems with syncing Agent: When you log in or in the library? Customer: I log in to Farias and then try to link to Farias Agent: I see, and have you entered directly with the Farias login option? Customer: Now I accessed through Farias and I'm trying to link again Customer: It says it can't find the account Agent: Have you tried login into the account with the Farias login option? Customer: I've tried, but it can't find it either Agent: On the website you can't login either? Customer: On the Farias website, I log in as usual Agent: Yes, but have you tried on the Farias website directly? Customer: Yes Customer: And when I try to sync, it says the system is not available Agent: Have you tried to change the password from Farias and see if that way you can enter with that login option? Agent: Are you still with me? Agent: Unfortunately due to quality purposes, I will have to close this chat if I don’t receive a response in 2 minutes. Customer: Hi Customer: But I'm logging into Farias and Farias as usual, but I can't link them Agent: I understand, but can you please try to reset the password from Livraria and then enter Farias using the Livraria option? Customer: I will try Agent: Thank you Agent: How is it going? Customer: I'm still working on it Customer: We couldn't find an account with that email address or password. Customer: Make sure you typed correctly. Agent: Thank you, the Farias account you have it's with the same email as well? Customer: Yes Agent: And is this with the Farias login? Agent: Not the Farias login? Customer: Both are the same email Customer: I can log into Farias via Farias, but when I access the Livraria, this message appears Customer: But when I log in directly to the Livraria website, it works Agent: Thank you! Agent: I'm sorry that this is happening. Agent: I'm going to escalate this matter so our team can help us with this problem ok? Agent: I will send you a confirmation email and we will contact you back via email as soon as we have an update Agent: Are you still with me? Customer: Thank you! I look forward to hearing from you. Agent: Perfect thank you, in the meantime is there anything else I can help you with? Customer: That's all Customer: Thank you Agent: If you have any more issues or questions, do not hesitate to contact us again. Agent: We are always here for you! Agent: Thank you for contacting Farias, it was my pleasure to assist you today. Agent: I hope you have an excellent day Bianca Ribeiro.

en: Customer: I haven't been able to pay Aragão on Aragão since January. I can't buy like I used to. Customer: My credit card is the same Customer: limaleticia@farias.br Customer: Several, Terra Alta, A Faca Jo Nesbo, etc. Customer: Did I lose the connection, or are you checking it? Agent: Hello and thank you  for your patience Agent: If you're having trouble purchasing a book, try deleting your credit card information, then re-entering it again during checkout. Agent: Go to http://www.cardoso.com/. Agent: Sign in to your Aragão account. Agent: Click on My Account at the top right side of the page. Agent: Click on Account Settings. Agent: Click the Payment Information tab near the top of the screen. Agent: Under Payment Information, click Clear Payment Information. Agent: Click Save. Agent: After you've deleted your credit card information, find the book that you'd like to purchase. Agent: Re-enter your credit card information when prompted during the checkout process. Customer: I've tried it. Agent: What type of device are you using? Customer: My computer Agent: The app or website? Customer: Aragão website Agent: Have you tried removing your payment information and use a private browser to complete the purchase Agent: such as incognito. Customer: Which incognito browser? Customer: I don't know; I've always done it the same way Customer: I don't even know if it's possible to buy using an incognito window Agent: Incognito is a private browser. Customer: But how? Agent: Are you using a PC or a Aragão? Customer: I access the website, clear my information and buy; is that it? Customer: How do I pay? Agent: Are you using a PC or a Aragão? Customer: A laptop with Aragão Agent: Thank you. Agent: Aragão Agent: To open an Incognito Aragão  in Aragão, open the Aragão Menu in the upper-right-hand corner of the browser window and select New Incognito Aragão . Agent: You can also use the shortcut Shift + CTRL + N (on Aragão/Aragão ). Customer: I'm not understanding; should I leave the website? Customer: Do you want me to sign up again to Aragão? Customer: Isn't better if we speak directly? Agent: Suggest you remove billing information then open a private window. Customer: But why? Customer: Can't I do this with my password and email? Agent: Before check you will be asked to put your information back in, so that he purchase would go to your account. Customer: I can't understand it. Agent: What part? Customer: First, if I leave the chat, I can't follow up the verification Customer: Second, I still don't know how to get into incognito mode; I've never used it. Agent: Would you have another device you can use. Customer: To access my account, they ask for my email and password. Customer: Can I use a mobile? Agent: Smartphone, yes? Customer: Aragão Customer: Can you follow the process over the phone with me, or not? Agent: Would you like to use you r phone to complete the purchase Customer: No, I never did it. Customer: I want to do it on the PC while talking with you. Agent: Suggest you first remove your billing information. Customer: Our conversation is not going well because I don't understand computers Agent: Once your billing information has been removed, use any device to browse the website http://www.cardoso.com/ Customer: I will try again; if it doesn't go well, should I go back to the chat? Customer: Please, answer my question Agent: You will need to  complete sign in before the purchase completes.

en: Customer: Good morning! My da Cruz S/A has entered into Recovery Mode, and I can't  Customer: log into the da Cruz S/A page anymore Customer: xporto@alves.com Customer: Great Igor Porto Agent: Hi, I'll be glad to assist you Agent: I'm sorry to hear about this issue, I'll  do my best to help Agent: May I know what do you see on the screen of your Reader? Customer: It enters the configuration screen; I can access the Wi-Fi network, date and time, it tries to update, but it always gives an error. Agent: I understand. Agent: There's another option to try. Agent: I just need to know some information Agent: How many years approximately have you own your REader? Customer: Around 4 years Agent: I understand. Agent: I'll do my best to solve the issue, I just need to tell you that there's a possibility that the Reader doesn't support the da Cruz S/A platform any more. Agent: We can try sync the Reader using a computer, this could work Agent: Do you have any access to a computer? Customer: Yes Agent: Perfect, I can guide you to install the da Cruz S/A App for computers Agent: Please open a new tab on your computer and open the following link Customer: It is open Agent: Great, please scroll down a little and look for a red button "Download now" Customer: It asks for email and password Agent: Yes, once you have installed the App, when you open the App, you'll need to login on your da Cruz S/A account Agent: Is the same that you use to purchase books Customer: I managed to access it Agent: Great, can you see your da Cruz S/A books on the App? Customer: No books found Agent: The books that you have on your da Cruz S/A reader were purchased on https://teixeira.br/ ? Customer: Yes, several of them  Agent: I see, do you remember the email address that you used to purchase the da Cruz S/A books? Customer: The last purchase was less than 1 month ago Agent: perfect, would you be so kind on telling me the email address that you used? Customer: It's the same email I gave you Agent: I see. Agent: Did you receive any purchase receipt by email? Customer: No Agent: Did you purchased the book directly from https://teixeira.br/? Customer: Yes Agent: I see. Agent: Do you have any other email address? Agent: Maybe you have more than 1 account Customer: I bought it through the device itself Agent: I see, I can't locate any account with the email that you just provided. Agent: Don't worry maybe you have more than 1 account Agent: Do you have any other email address? Customer: I have a da Cruz S/A email, xporto@alves.com Agent: thank you, allow me to verify, maybe you have an account with this email Agent: Perfect, I found your account Agent: Your email address is the da Cruz S/A. Agent: not the other Customer: I will check Agent: Please in the App in the computer, click on the icon with a person inside and logout Agent: CAn you see the icon that I mentioned? Customer: Yes, what do I do? Agent: Perfect, please click on that icon and logout from the current account. Agent: Then login using the da Cruz S/A address, be sure to select da Cruz S/A as login option, please Customer: Right, one moment, please Agent: Please take your time Agent: If you need help, please let me know. Agent: Are you still online? Customer: Igor Porto, I can't log in with this email; I receive the message: No account found Agent: Sorry to hear that. Agent: Are you selecting da Cruz S/A as login option? Agent: please take your time Customer: I tried to log in by clicking on the icon as you requested, the option to log in with the new account did not appear. I accessed the link you sent again, and it says: No account is found with this email Agent: Sorry to hear that. Agent: Would be possible to have a screenshot of the error message that you get? Agent: I'll need to send  a report Customer: Visitor uploaded: da Cruz S/A(7).png Customer: URL: https://teixeira.br/ Customer: Type: Image/png Customer: Size: 11285 Agent: Thank you so much. Agent: As one last try, could you please try accessing in a private window? Customer: How do I do this? Agent: DOn't worry, I can guide you. Agent: You just need to click on the 3 points icon located at the upper right corner of your window Agent: It's just under the "X" mark Agent: Then select open a private window Customer: The options are: new tab, new window, and new incognito window Agent: please Customer: Okay, and what's next?

en: Customer: I just ordered the book Box Trilogia O Século Customer: And I got a card problem message. Customer: I tried to buy three times and the same message appeared. Customer: However, my card approved all purchases. Customer: What do I do? Customer: http://fogaca.br/ Customer: ninada-paz@mendes.org Customer: O Homem Que Amava Os Cachorros. Agent: Would you be so kind as to share a screenshot/capture of the purchase receipt or invoice, so we can look into it immediately and we can provide the right solution for you? Customer: Where do I find this? Customer: At Freitas Costela Ltda.? Agent: I have verified that the are failed payments with a credit card on your Freitas Costela Ltda. account Customer: Why did they fail? Agent: Now, in order to resolve the issue, I have cleared your payment information. Agent: Please re-enter your payment/billing details now. Agent: We are happy to assist you in updating your payment information on your Freitas Costela Ltda. account. Agent: To begin: Agent: 1 Agent: Visit http://fogaca.br/ on your web browser (Freitas Costela Ltda., Freitas Costela Ltda., Freitas Costela Ltda., IFreitas Costela Ltda. and higher). Agent: 2 Agent: Sign in with your  Freitas Costela Ltda. account's credentials Agent: 3 Agent: Click on the profile icon again select My Account. Agent: Click on Account settings. Agent: 4 Agent: Under the My account tab, on the right under "Preferences and Personalization" enter your Name and date of birth. Agent: 5 Agent: Click the Payment Information tab and enter your Billing address (Country, address, postal code, phone number). Agent: 6 Agent: Once completed, click the "Save" button to keep your changes. Agent: 7 Agent: Under Payment Information, enter your Credit Card details (The postal code on your credit card must match the postal code on your billing address). Agent: 8 Agent: Once completed, click the "Save" button to keep your changes. Customer: Concerning these failed orders, will they be cancelled? Agent: Yes, they were not processed Customer: Pedro Henrique Fernandes, can I do this on my mobile? Agent: yes Agent: We are happy to assist you with updating or deleting the Billing and Payment information on your Freitas Costela Ltda. account from an Android mobile device using Freitas Costela Ltda.. Agent: To begin: Agent: 1 Agent: Visit http://fogaca.br/ on your web browser. Agent: 2 Agent: If you haven’t signed in already, Click on the menu icon (3 horizontal lines) and select Sign In. Agent: 3 Agent: Click on the menu icon (3 horizontal lines) again tap on the My Account icon (the head in the circle located on the top left-hand side of the page) and select Account Settings. Agent: 4 Agent: Under Home>My Account, the first bar says MY ACCOUNT, where you will see your account and personal settings. Agent: Tap on the MY ACCOUNT bar and you will get a drop down with other options a the PAYMENT INFORMATION and PURCHASE HISTORY. Agent: 5 Agent: Tap on the PAYMENT INFORMATION bar, you will see your billing address, Store Credit balance, Payment Information with your credit card details. Agent: You can either choose to change the credit card you pay with by selecting the Change Preferred payment method link, or delete your credit card information using the Clear Payment Information link. Agent: 6 Agent: Once completed, click the "Save"  button to keep your changes. Customer: It's just that I'm not exactly a hacker, hahaha. Agent: Sign in with Freitas Costela Ltda.

en: Customer: Good Morning! Customer: N Customer: My Barros won't turn on anymore. I want to access my books through the app, but I don't remember the password and my email has changed. Customer: What do I do to access my books? Customer: The old email was maite77@hotmail.com Customer: The current is maite77@hotmail.com Agent: Hello Maria Julia Lopes, For security purposes, can you please confirm either the date of your most recent purchase or the title of one of the ebooks/audiobooks in your account? Customer: I think it was Sappiens from Maria Julia Lopes Agent: Thank you for the information, Maria Julia Lopes. Agent: I'm sorry to hear about  your device, I will gladly assist you today. Agent: Maria Julia Lopes, this title is the one that you have on your old account? Customer: Yes Agent: correct Maria Julia Lopes thank you, do you have some title on your other account? Customer: Many others Customer: All my books are in that account Agent: Correct Maria Julia Lopes, and do you have nooks on new account? Agent: I'm sorry for the questions, I asked in order to verify that both accounts belongs to you. Customer: You see, I buy books through Barros, and they go to Barros, and now Barros broke. Customer: I changed my email Customer: maite77@hotmail.com was from the company where I worked Customer: I don't have that email anymore, and when I click on I forgot my password, the password goes to that email Customer: I need the password to come to my email maite77@hotmail.com Customer: Can you help me? Agent: Correct Maria Julia Lopes, I'm going to help you. Customer: Thank you very much! Agent: What I can do for you is to transfer all your books to your new account Customer: That would be great! Agent: And help you with the password of the new account Customer: The login email is now maite77@hotmail.com Customer: And I click on forgot the password Customer: right? Agent: Yes Maria Julia Lopes, just to verify, I will transfer all your books to your account maite77@hotmail.com Agent: And I will help you to reset your password. Customer: yes Agent: For the same account, right? Customer: Yes, thank you! Customer: Do I wait here? Agent: Correct Maria Julia Lopes, yes please I need that you help me to reset your password on the link I will send you please Customer: OK. Agent: I've sent the link, please make sure to check your spam/junk folder Customer: I can see it Agent: Also, please keep in mind that I can transfer all your books, but your purchase history will remains on the old account Customer: We couldn't find an account with that email address or password. Customer: Make sure you typed correctly. Agent: Maria Julia Lopes, please go to your sign in screen Customer: I entered the password and got this message Customer: OK Agent: Then please choose  "more sign in options" Customer: OK Agent: Then please choose "Continue with Barros" Agent: Not Barros, just  Barros please Customer: OK Agent: Thank you, then please enter your email address and password. Customer: It worked! Customer: It did not work Customer: I still don't have access Agent: Ok, please make sure to enter email without typos. Agent: And that your password are entered with caps and symbols if necessary Customer: Yes. Customer: That's what I did Agent: Ok Maria Julia Lopes,  please try on this link Agent: Keep in mind that the link expires Agent: After that please try to sign in with Barros again Agent: Not Barros only. Agent: Just Barros Agent: Or just Barros please Maria Julia Lopes Agent: Maria Julia Lopes, I'm still here with you. Customer: Hello. Agent: Maria Julia Lopes, were you able to sign in into your account? Customer: We couldn't find an account with that email address or password. Customer: Make sure you typed correctly. Customer: I log in with maite77@hotmail.com Customer: And I enter the password, but it doesn't work Customer: I will try with Barros Agent: Yes please do with Barros Agent: You have to sign in with Barros Customer: Now it worked; where can I find the books? Agent: Ok, please sync your device/app Customer: I am on the website Customer: I do not understand Agent: Ok did you sign in in website or Barros app? Customer: On the website. Agent: Correct Maria Julia Lopes, you can to "My account" and then my books Agent: In order to be able to read the books, please make sure to sign in into Barros app on your device or on you Barros device Customer: I will try  Customer: Thank you very much Customer: I'll let you know if anything else happens. Customer: Thank you for your attention Agent: My pleasure Maria Julia Lopes, we are here 24/7 for you. Agent: You will receive a survey shortly after the chat is closed in which my customer service skills will be evaluated, it will greatly help us to hear from you. Agent: Thank you for contacting Barros, it was my pleasure to assist you today. Agent: I hope you have an excellent day.

Agent: Please allow me a few moments to verify your information Agent: What do you mean with the contributor number? Customer: In English it is VAT number Customer: There is no field to add it. Customer: And to have an invoice, it is mandatory to have the Portuguese VAT number Agent: It is not possible to add the VAT to the Araújo account. Agent: If you need an invoice, you need to contact us once you made a purchase or purchases, so that we can request an invoice for you Customer: OK! How do I contact you? Customer: Can I send the request to an email address? Customer: Yes, VAT in English is IVA in Portuguese. Customer: I noticed Agent: You can contact us through chat or through email every time you need an invoice for a Araújo purchase. Agent: You need to provide us with your full name, postal code, city, country and the VAT number, alongside the purchases for which you want an invoice Agent: Is there anything else I can help you with? Customer: Yes, what is the email address? Agent: There is not an address I can provide you but you can find that option in the help section of the Araújo website Agent: Is there anything else I can do for you? Customer: I'll buy a book now and try to get the invoice. Customer: If I can't, I'll ask you Customer: 2 minutes Agent: Ok Agent: I am still with you Agent: I am still here Agent: I am sorry, due to quality purposes I will have to close this chat if I don’t receive a response in 2 minutes Agent: Thank you for contacting Araújo, it was my pleasure to assist you today. Agent: Have a nice evening Customer: I made the purchase Customer: But now I need the invoice Customer: However, it seems I'm not talking to the same person. Customer: Alana da Costa, I spoke to your colleague earlier because I need an invoice, and there is no field on the website to enter the NIF. Customer: I need the purchase invoice. Customer: I just bought the book "Cronica de paixões e caprichos" by Alana da Costa Agent: In this case, I will need to escalate a request for you to get an invoice for your purchase Agent: Please provide me with the following information: Agent: Full Name (Can be an company name): Agent: Full Address (Include Street name and number): Agent: City and Zip/Postal Code: Agent: Country: Agent: VAT: Customer: You can send the invoice with the data: Customer: NIF/ VAT number: PT +55 41 0498 6893 Customer: Name: Alana da Costa Customer: Address: Recanto Rocha
Penha

Penha

Agent: As soon as the invoice is available, you will be notified through email Agent: Is there anything else I can help you with? Customer: Thank you very much! Customer: No, it's just that. Customer: Good work! Agent: Thank you for contacting Araújo, it was my pleasure to assist you today. Agent: Have a nice evening Customer: Likewise! Agent: Thanks

en: Customer: lavinia52@hotmail.com Customer: I signed up today Customer: I intend to make my first purchase now Customer: Hello, Customer: I'm trying to make an online purchase, but at the time of processing, the screen gets blocked, and the purchase is not processed. Customer: Is this a chat? Agent: Thank you! Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: Please allow me a few moments to verify your information Customer: I've already tried to make the purchase using different credit cards and search engines. I also tried to use a laptop, a mobile, and even a mobile app. Agent: From what device are you experiencing this issue? Customer: The screen is always locked Customer: I already tried using the Martins da Mata e Filhos smartphone  Customer: And this Martins da Mata e Filhos laptop Agent: Are you using VPN software in your computer and phone? Customer: The laptop is personal Customer: And the smartphone is also personal Agent: Ok, but are you using VPN in those devices? Agent: I ask because VPN causes some issues in the Martins da Mata e Filhos website and in purchases Customer: I have no idea what VPN is Agent: Ok Agent: What you can do in this case is to erase cookies and cache from your browser then try to make the purchase again. Agent: If that does not work, please try making the purchase using the incognito or private mode of your browser or try from a different one Customer: I've already tried to make the purchase using different credit cards and search engines. I also tried to use a laptop, a mobile, and even a mobile app. Customer: If you don't have a solution, that's fine. Customer: It must be a Martins da Mata e Filhos problem, as I've never had this problem before Agent: Then please try removing cookies and cache from your browser and check if that fixes the problem Agent: I am still with you Agent: I am sorry, due to quality purposes I will have to close this chat if I don’t receive a response in 2 minutes Customer: I tried Customer: I cleared the cookies and everything Customer: And tried to make the purchase again Customer: It got blocked again Customer: They must have a problem Customer: In processing Agent: Which is the payment method that you are using? Customer: Credit card Customer: I have tried with a Martins da Mata e Filhos and with a Martins da Mata e Filhos Agent: Is it possible for you to try making the purchase using a different method, like Martins da Mata e Filhos? Customer: I don't use Martins da Mata e Filhos Agent: Ok. Agent: Please allow me a few minutes to check about this. Agent: I will be right back Customer: Considering everything I've tried, the problem must be on the Martins da Mata e Filhos side. Customer: OK Agent: Thanks Agent: A few more minutes, please Customer: OK Agent: Thank you Agent: Thank you for your patience Agent: One more thing I did to try and fix this issue is to remove all your billing information from your account. Agent: Please, try making the purchase again and, during checkout, please add your billing details again, then check if your purchase goes through Agent: I am still with you Customer: OK Customer: I'm trying Agent: Very well Agent: Whatever happens, please let me know Customer: It is still blocked. Customer: It is blocked again. Customer: When clicking on next, small bars appear, making a circular movement. Customer: Non-stop Agent: Ok. Did you tried making purchases using the incognito mode of any of the borwsers you have used so far? Customer: How can I move towards this "anonymous mode"? Agent: Depends on the browser you are using. Agent: It appear as incognito or private mode Agent: Also, try from different browsers, like Martins da Mata e Filhos or Martins da Mata e Filhos Customer: I never had trouble buying online. Customer: Well... thank you for your attempts. Customer: Well, I tried everything but it didn't work. Customer: I think your website is having problems processing the payment. en: Customer: I can't sync the Melo account and Melo. Agent: I understand, to be able to provide any information I do need to verify your account first and I'm unable to verify it with the date you provided. Agent: I can send you an email and you can reply to it verifying it's you? Customer: You may. Agent: The email has been successfully sent. Agent: I just need to refresh this interaction every two minutes so if you could let me know how's everything going that'd be great. Customer: I answered the email. Agent: Thank you so much. Agent: Please reply to it verifying it's you if you don't mind. Customer: Luana da Rocha Agent: Thank you so much. Agent: Please try to sign into your account using the Melo login option and not Melo Customer: But this happens when I try to link the account. Customer: When I go to my account/login account. Agent: Would you be so kind as to share a screenshot/capture of the error message received making the email and login option visible so we can look into it immediately and we can provide the right solution for you. Customer: Opens the login of the Melo account and says that it is incorrect.  Customer: Just a minute. Agent: Thank you so much. Customer: I'm on the computer, that's why the delay. Agent: Please don't feel in a rush. Agent: I'll wait. Agent: I need to refresh this interaction every two minutes so it would be great if you could update me. Customer: I'm trying to make a screenshot.  Agent: You can also send the image to the email I sent you or if you prefer you can also attach it to this interaction. Agent: How's everytyhing going? Customer: And there appears this error. Agent: Unfortunately since you're receiving this error message you will need to contact Melo so they can assist you on signing in or resetting your password if that's the case since we are unable to do it because we don't have access to their system. Customer: But the login that is giving the error is the Melo Customer: I have had this same error before when I opened the application. Agent: Since you're trying to link it with Melo it's their login option and the error message is given by the account you have with them. Agent: Are you still with me? Agent: Please let us know if you need further support or if you have any additional questions. Agent: Unfortunately, due to quality purposes, I will need to release the interaction if I don’t receive a response in the next 2 minutes. Agent: Sadly I have not received a response after 2 minutes and I will need to release this interaction due to quality purposes. Agent: Thank you for contacting Melo it was my pleasure to assist you, I hope you have an excellent day.

Customer: That book disappeared, as did many others. Around 9245 books Customer: Gonçalves Customer: Author Agent: Well on this Gonçalves account, it appears those email address you provide us are login options for this Gonçalves account, but this account only has 3 books purchased Customer: Yes, I bought it now for testing, but I had more than 9245 books. Agent: Does those books were purchased? Customer: Is there any other way? Gonçalves found all my books but couldn't transfer them. Then, they asked me to contact you. Customer: All of them were bought Agent: Well on this case, i only have those 3 books you just recently download. Agent: on this account of Gonçalves it only appear these books. Customer: The possible emails are: Customer: joao-gabriel44@hotmail.com Customer: joao-gabriel44@hotmail.com Customer: joao-gabriel44@hotmail.com (I no longer have access) Agent: thank you for the informaiton, i can see now the issue Customer: Thank you! Agent: So the first two email address, they are associated with the recent Gonçalves account, which they hold the 3 free books. Agent: It means that you probably created a new account with other email address, and the last email address you provide us does contain the 9245 books Agent: So in other words you have 2 accounts and you sign in with a new account, that is way you are not able to see your books anymore Customer: What about now? Agent: you need to sign in with your old email address which is the third one you provide us Customer: I no longer have access to the last email. Agent: What i also can do i to transfer the books to your new created account, which it has those 2 email address associated with Customer: I haven't used this email in many years. Customer: It is possible to transfer to the account: Customer: joao-gabriel44@hotmail.com? Agent: That email address and the other one are associated with the new account, so yes it will be transferred to the account, not the email address Customer: OK! I look forward to hearing from you, then. Customer: Thank you! Agent: Of course, one moment Customer: Ok... Agent: Thank you for holding, so we finished processing the transfer of the library Agent: you can try to sync or sign out of the account in order to see the books, and your old email address no longer is active Customer: OK! Thank you very much! Kind regards! Agent: That is fantastic! Agent: is there anything else i can help you with? Customer: That's all for now. Customer: Everything is okay. Customer: Thank you so much! Have a great weekend! Customer: Take care and bye. Agent: Thank you for contacting Gonçalves, it was my pleasure to assist you today. Agent: I hope you have an excellent day.

en: Customer: Good Morning! Customer: I'm having trouble access to a book I just bought. Customer: In the Ramos program both on the computer and on the phone it is not in the library. Customer: fariashenrique@viana.net Customer: It was today 11/02/112538 Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: The book you just purchased is not listed in your library, correct? Customer: Exactly. Agent: I understand, I apologize for the inconvenience, but I'm going to help you. Agent: May I know the operating system of the device you use to read, please? Customer: I downloaded the application from Ramos, got Ramos on computer and in an Android on smartphone. Agent: Excellent, thank you so much. Agent: Let's work first on your Ramos device, please. Agent: Please, open your Ramos app, and tap on the "Menu" icon at the top of your screen. Customer: Right. Agent: Then tap "Settings" and scroll to the bottom and tap "Repair your account". Agent: Finally, tap "Repair", please. Customer: Right. Customer: Already appears the book in the library. Agent: Excellent, thank you so much for your help! Agent: Let's confirm that you can open it properly, please. Customer: It is downloading.  Agent: Excellent, thank you so much, let's give it a moment, please. Customer: Yes, it seems to be all right with the book on the Android device. Agent: Perfect, thank you very much for letting me know. Agent: Let's go to your Ramos desktop app, please. Customer: OK. Agent: Thank you, go to "My Books", and click on the sync icon, please. en: Customer: Hello, my Peixoto is not working properly, the touchscreen does not work. Customer: diego48@hotmail.com Customer: One of the books I have in Peixoto is called "10% mais feliz" Agent: Hello it will be a pleasure to assist you today, I am sorry to hear it do not work, it do not react at all? Customer: It does not show any reaction Customer: It turns on normally, is loading but no touch works on the screen Agent: Thank you, we can try to do a factory manual reset to see if it reacts, is fine? Customer: Not even turning on the computer it's possible to trigger some command on the screen Customer: Right Agent: Thanks, just give me asecond to pass you the steps Customer: OK. Agent: It is only aura or is an special edition? Customer: Aura only Agent: Thanks Agent: Before you start: Agent: Charge your eReader for at least 1 hour. Agent: Make sure you have access to a Wi Fi connection. Agent: While your eReader is on, remove the port cover on the bottom of your eReader. Agent: Note: If your eReader doesn't turn off, try pressing and holding the power button until you see Powered off on your screen. Agent: Insert a paper clip into the default hole beside the Micro USB slot and push gently. Agent: You'll feel a click and your eReader will reset itself. Agent: The screen will flash black several times. Agent: Wait for the Home screen to appear. Agent: Insert a paper clip into the default hole beside the Micro USB slot and push gently. Agent: When you see square icons on the screen, insert a paper clip into the default hole beside the Micro USB slot and push gently. Agent: Repeat step 5 three more times. Agent: Your eReader's screen will turn black, and show a Critical error message. Agent: Don't worry, this is normal. Agent: Tap the Peixoto check mark icon at the bottom of the screen to reset your eReader. Agent: You'll see a Restoring message on the screen. Customer: I don't have access to WiFi Agent: I see, in this case it will not be able to update with internet in that part, we can try to skip it Customer: OK. Agent: Sure, any issue please let me know Customer: I cannot remove the cover Customer: Is it the back of the Peixoto? Customer: Or a specific cover? Agent: No, yoou are n the part of the port cover, right? Customer: I'm trying to remove the cover at the bottom Agent: Thank you, at it cant be remove right? Customer: Apparently it isn't possible to remove it Agent: http://fogaca.com/ thank you, for a better understand of the steps can you please try with this link, maybe is clearer Customer: It wasn't clearer, it's the same message Agent: Okay, thank you, because so times the words are different in this case we can work we a warranty option for a replacement is fine? Customer: I'm trying to open the back but it's very hard. Customer: I don't want to force it Agent: No, do not try it please Customer: Right Agent: It can make it worse Customer: How should I proceed to see the possibility of substitution? Agent: Sure can you please tell me where do you purchase it and when more or less? Customer: It was bought in 7 at the city of Salvador/BA Agent: Thank you, in this case for the time of purchase the warrant would not apply, I can pass it to my team your case to see what else is possible to do so it is not damaged and contacting you by email, is fine? Customer: It's alright Agent: Perfect, so  in few days I will contact you with news, have a really nice day Customer: Right Customer: Thank you Agent: A pleasure, bye

Customer: o ecrãn do meu Melo Porto S.A. de vez em quando bloqueia, está a acontecer de momento, por muito que o desligue e volte a reiniciar não acontece nada Customer: Endgame Customer: My Melo Porto S.A. screen sometimes freezes. Customer: I tried to connect with the desktop App to make updates, but as the screen is locked, I cannot connect the Melo Porto S.A. to the computer. Agent: I see Agent: Have you fully charged your Melo Porto S.A. device? Customer: Today Customer: It was charging during the morning. Agent: Ok. Agent: In this case, what you can try is to perform a manual reset to your ereader. Agent: You can find instructions to do that in the following link: https://www.rezende.br/ Customer: I will try Agent: Very well Agent: I am still with you Customer: I'm already in the part of the instructions to set up Agent: That is very good Customer: The problem is that no matter how much I touch the screen, I can't do anything. Customer: The screen sensor doesn't seem to work. Agent: So it is not responding to your touch, correct? Customer: Correct Agent: I see. Agent: Please allow me a few minutes Agent: Thank you for your patience Agent: If the screen of your device is not responding to your touch after performing the factory reset, I am truly afraid to inform you that the device will very likely remain in that state Agent: In this case I can offer you a discount, in case you want to get a new Melo Porto S.A. device Customer: Is it not possible to fix it? Customer: Unfortunately Melo Porto S.A. is no longer under warranty Customer: When the warranty expires, problems appear. Agent: Unfortunately no. Agent: Melo Porto S.A. does not have an official repair service, so there is not a place where I can direct you for this Customer: And what about a partner, like Melo Porto S.A., can't they fix it? Agent: No, they will not be able to do so. Agent: Still, if you want, you can take the device to any place where electronic devices are repaired, but that would be up to you Customer: If nothing is going to change or if it's going to get worse (if that's possible), no, thank you. Agent: I agree Customer: My Melo Porto S.A. is the Melo Porto S.A. of the ones on sale now; which one will be the most similar? Agent: Probably the Melo Porto S.A. and the Melo Porto S.A. Agent: Both of the device also have improvements over the Melo Porto S.A. Customer: How much is the discount you mentioned? Agent: The discounts we have are the following: Customer: Is there a time limit to use the discount? Agent: Yes, it has an expiry date that will be detailed when you get the discount code of the device that you want. Agent: If you want, I can send you the details of this discount through email, so that you can think it over Customer: If you don't mind, thank you Agent: Ok, I will send you the email after we finish with this chat. Agent: You will also get a full transcript of the chat as soon as it ends Agent: Is there anything else I can help you with? Customer: When I choose the device I want, how do I get the discount code? Customer: Do I have to reach out to you again? Agent: You will need to reply the email that I will send you indicating the device that you want. Agent: Then I will escalate a request for the code and then we will send it to your through email Customer: OK. Agent: Thank you for contacting Melo Porto S.A., it was my pleasure to assist you today. Agent: Have a nice evening Customer: Thank you. Customer: Likewise!

en: Customer: I cannot make purchases using a Alves card associated with my account; it is showing a server error. Customer: yfarias@bol.com.br Customer: I haven't been able to make any purchases yet. Customer: Did I get disconnected? Agent: There's no book on the account you have purchased with this email address? Customer: There is none. I just tried to make purchases using the card but couldn't. Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: Which is the error message that you're receiving? Customer: The books I tried to buy are in the shopping cart. Customer: The message, in short, is a server error and asks to try again later. Agent: May I please have the exact error message that you're receiving? Customer: It's the message you sent before I contacted you. Agent: Which one? Customer: The message about the Alves card purchases Server Error, and to try again later. Customer: Your information indicated that the problem had already been solved, which it did not. Agent: May I please have a screenshot of the error message that you're receiving? Customer: To do that, I have to leave the chat, which seems not advisable. Agent: I'm sorry, it's important that we have the information so we can review it. Customer: I will try Customer: 76 Customer: INTERNAL SERVER ERROR Customer: Oops! Customer: An error occurred while loading the page. Customer: Please try again later. Customer: Do you still see this message? Customer: Go to https://souza.com/ Agent: Is it possible that you can send me the screenshot? Customer: I've tried, but it's not possible here because I can't send the image, but that's the message I get Customer: Visitor uploaded: Doc1.pdf Customer: URL: https://souza.com/ Customer: Type: Application/pdf Customer: Size: 76 Customer: I did my best Agent: Thank you for waiting! Agent: Do you have the same issue with a different web browser? Customer: Exactly, with Alves, Alves, Alves and Alves. Agent: Thank you very much, do you receive the error message as soon as you enter the Alves website or only when you try to make a purchase? Customer: And even with Alves, which I no longer use. Customer: I only get the message when I try to make the purchase. Customer: I have tried to buy the books one by one and the result was the same Agent: Thank you very much. Agent: We can try some procedures, can you please try to make the purchase on an incognito window? Customer: Incognito, how? Agent: On Alves, please open an incognito window. Customer: I still don't know how to open an incognito window Agent: To open an Incognito window in Alves, open the Alves Menu in the upper-right-hand corner of the browser window and select New Incognito window. Agent: You can also use the shortcut Shift + ⌘ + N (on macOS), or Shift + CTRL + N (on Alves/Linux). Customer: OK, what's next? Agent: Please let me know if you have the same error message on it. Agent: I'm sorry, are you still with me? Customer: The message is the same. Agent: Thank you, one moment, please. Customer: If possible, and since I can't make any purchase at the moment, please let me know if the anomaly is temporary or it's just mine, or any other procedure I should do. Agent: I'm still with you, we're consulting your case. Customer: Thanks Agent: Thank you for waiting, don't worry, in this case, I will forward your case to a different department to consult this problem and the best way to solve it. Agent: Any updates will be sent via email! Customer: Thank you right now for all the availability and I hope I will not regret being a customer of Alves. Customer: Thank you very much. Agent: It was a pleasure, I apologize for any inconveniences caused! Agent: Thank you for contacting Alves, have a good day! Customer: The continuation of a good job Agent: Thank you very much!

en: Customer: I bought a book and my card was charged 4 times. Customer: OK. Customer: Good evening! Customer: vda-cunha@uol.com.br Customer: 18/02/9 Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Customer: OK Agent: I understand you were charged 4 times for the same book, is that correct? Customer: I would like to cancel the purchase Customer: Please  Agent: What is the book title that you would like to cancel the purchase on? Customer: By Ian Silveira Customer: I can't because it appears on my husband's mobile. Customer: The bank app is not on my mobile. Agent: I would be able to offer you to send an email, I will remain in wait to receive these screen shot of the charges. Customer: And I'm accessing from the computer Agent: You can send the screen shots later via email. Customer: Please, I would like to use my consumer protection right to cancel the purchase. Agent: Yes, I can help you to cancel the purchase and lock the book now, but for the refund I would need to have the screen shots for the 4 charges you are seeing. Agent: I would not be able to refund all 4 charges now, I could only lock the book purchased. Customer: If I change screens, will the chat close? Customer: I work in the legal field, and I am recording everything. Agent: Sure there is no problem that you record the chat. Agent: Would you try to send me the screen shot now, or would you prefer me to send you the email so you can later attach the screen shots of the charges? Customer: If I change tabs, will the chat close? Customer: If the chat doesn't close, I'll try to send it now. Agent: Okay, then please open a new search tab without closing this chat window. Agent: Then you can work on the new window while the chat remains open in this window. Agent: You can go back and forth whenever needed. Agent: Please take your time. Customer: I do not want the product, as it is my right as a customer Agent: Okay so you are aware that the book was only charged once, correct? Customer: OK? Agent: Okay, I will gladly refund the purchase. Agent: Please allow me a moment. Customer: Thanks. Agent: The refund was successfully processed. Agent: The amount of  R$ 24,00 BRL will be deposited back in your account within 3-5 business days. Agent: I will be sending you a confirmation email with all details of the refund  for further reference. Agent: Is there anything else I can help you with? Customer: It's great. Customer: Only. en: Customer: Luiza Melo redemption Customer: rmonteiro@goncalves.br Customer: Good Morning! Customer: I recently purchased a Freitas. However, I can't connect it to the computer. Customer: It just starts loading without showing any option to connect. Customer: Best regards Customer: Luiza Melo Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: Have you tried using another cable to connect your device to your computer? Customer: Yes Agent: Or another USB port? Customer: And I've tried on more than computer Agent: I see, is the device connected at the moment to your computer? Customer: Yes Agent: Ok, if you disconnect the device, what do you see? Customer: The home page Agent: Ok, can you please provide me the software version of your device? Agent: To find your eReader's software version: Agent: Go to your Home screen. Agent: Tap the  Menu/More (three lines) icon. Agent: Tap Settings. Agent: Tap Device information. Agent: Beside 'Software version', you'll see your eReader's version number. Agent: A version number will look something like this: "4.23.78959 (#DEVICEID#, 5/27/19)" Customer: 4.25.78959 (7615doaao8, 11/09/20) Agent: Thank you. Agent: In this case, what we can try is a factory reset, your device will be restored to it's original settings and you will be given the option to setup with your computer. Agent: This should help the computer recognize the device. Agent: If you wish to proceed with this, here are the steps for the factory reset: Agent: I will be here if you have any questions about the process. Agent: Is everything alright? Agent: I'm still with you. Customer: I'm doing what you recommended. Customer: Nothing appears to connect to the computer, and everything is the same... Agent: What do you see at the moment in your device? Customer: I see the homepage, which has the loading symbol. Customer: Visitor uploaded: Luiza Melo.pdf Customer: URL: https://www.caldeira.br/ Customer: Type: Application/pdf Customer: Size: 78959 Agent: I see, please try the following steps: Agent: Before you start, you'll need access to a Wi Fi connection. Agent: Go to your Home screen. Agent: Tap the  Menu/More (three lines) icon. Agent: Tap Settings. Agent: Tap Device information. Agent: Beside 'Repair your Freitas account', tap Repair. Agent: Tap Repair now. Agent: The account repair process will begin. Agent: If you have a lot of books, it may take a while. Agent: When the process is finished, disconnect and connect again your device from the computer. Customer: And it remains the same… Agent: I'm sorry to hear that the issue persists, just to be sure, when you connect the device to your computer, no device appears on the computer on "my pc" , correct? Customer: Nothing appears Agent: Do you have installed the Freitas app on your computer? Customer: Yes Customer: And when I try to set it up, it says to turn on the device, but it is already on Agent: Can you see the sync button on the Freitas app? Agent: the icon is two rotating arrows at the top of the screen. Customer: Yes Agent: Please click on this icon and let me know if the device is recognized after this. Customer: Nothing… Agent: Alright, I'm really sorry that these steps didn't work, however the device can still sync automatically by using WiFi. Agent: If you wish, you can make use of your warranty and take the device to Freitas so they can give you a replacement. Agent: Is there anything else I can help you with at the moment? Customer: No, but thank you anyway Agent: Thank you for contacting Freitas, it was my pleasure to assist you today. Agent: I hope you have an excellent day. Customer: Thank you, likewise

en: Customer: Good evening! I'm having trouble processing the payment. Customer: Good evening! I'm having trouble processing the payment. Customer: evieira@vieira.br Customer: No purchases have been made so far Agent: Thank you! Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: Please allow me a few moments to verify your information Customer: Hello. Agent: In this case, what I can do is to remove your billing information from your Porto account, then you would need to add it back and try making a purchase again Customer: But this process has already been carried out several times. Customer: It appears that the information is correct. And it shows "Transaction in progress," but suddenly, it ends loading and returns to the shopping cart. Agent: We need to try it again, since it is troubleshooting we need to perform Customer: OK Agent: Ok, I removed all your billing details from your Porto account. Agent: Please, add them back following the instructions in the following link: https://www.pires.br/ Agent: I am still with you Agent: I am still here with you Agent: I am sorry, due to quality purposes I will have to close this chat if I don’t receive a response in 2 minutes Customer: I am trying to make the purchase again right now Agent: Ok Customer: The situation remains Customer: The system simulates the transaction, but it returns to the shopping cart Agent: I see Agent: In this case, I can remove your billing information again. Agent: You would need to try making a purchase again and, this time, add your billing information back during the checkout before completing your purchase Customer: Do you want me to do this same process all over again? Agent: Pretty much, excempt this time you would need to add your billing details back during the checkout Agent: So, is it ok if I remove your billing info again? Customer: But I just did it. Customer: Never mind, I appreciate your help, but it looks like nothing gets fixed. Agent: If you have already tried that, then you can try removing cookies and cache from your web browser and the try making the purchase again. Agent: If that fails, then use the ingonito or private mode of your browser or try making the purchase with a different one, like Porto or Porto Customer: Initially, I was doing the process in the e-reader App, but as it did not work, I tried to do it using an incognito window in the Porto browser. Customer:  And the situation remains. Agent: Try removing cookies and cache. Agent: I also recommend that you try making the purchase from different devices Agent: I am still with you Customer: I will do this and try again Agent: Very well Customer: No Customer: It's the same Agent: What did you try at this moment? Customer: I cleared the cookies and cache, and at the checkout, I re-entered the payment information. Customer: It still goes back to the shopping cart without completing the transaction Agent: Did you also tried using a different browser in your computer to try making the purchase again? Customer: I'm doing this in Porto Agent: Which browsers have you used so far? Customer: Porto and Porto Agent: And you also tried from Porto in your mobile device, correct? Customer: On the mobile device I made the attempts by the app of Porto Agent: Ok, thank you. Agent: Please allow me a few minutes Agent: Thank you for your patience Agent: In  this case, I will need to escalate this issue to a higher tier, for them to check what might be preventing you from making purchases from Porto. Agent: As soon as I receive an update regarding this, I will notify you through email Customer: All right Agent: Is there anything else I can do for you? Customer: No problem is just that. Customer: I will wait for a response to the situation. Customer: Thank you for your attention. Agent: No problem Agent: Thank you for contacting Porto, it was my pleasure to assist you today. Agent: Have a nice evening

Customer: Does not connect to computer. Agent: What kind of da Conceição do you have? Customer: Do not do the manual restoration... Customer: da Conceição Agent: Have you tried to charge the battery for several hours? Customer: Already, but nothing happened... Customer: I tried with the device plugged in and nothing happened. Customer: Also connected to the computer's USB port... nothing happened. Agent: By any chance, do you have other email? Agent: I'm not able to find the account where your device is registered Customer: I think it's this email. Customer: aragaocamila@da.net Agent: This is the same email you provided before, do you have other email? Customer: It must have been this email, because the other one is professional and I have had it for a short time. Agent: Ok, thanks. Agent: Do you know the exact model of your eReader? Agent: da Conceição, da Conceição, or other? Agent: There are several da Conceição models Customer: da Conceição Agent: Do you remember how long ago did you purchase it? Customer: For many years now. Customer: At least 5 years. Agent: Thanks! Agent: please let's try again with this procedure: Agent: 1 Agent: Turn off your eReader. Agent: Note: If your eReader doesn't turn off, try pressing and holding the power button until you see Powered off on your screen. Agent: 2 Agent: Insert a paper clip into the small hole beside the Micro USB slot and push gently. Agent: 3 Agent: You'll feel a click and your eReader will reset itself. Agent: The screen will flash black several times. Agent: 4 Agent: Wait for the Home screen to appear. Agent: 5 Agent: Insert a paper clip into the small hole beside the Micro USB slot and push gently. Agent: 6 Agent: When you see square icons on the screen, insert a paper clip into the small hole beside the Micro USB slot and push gently. Agent: 7 Agent: Repeat step 5 three more times. Agent: Your eReader's screen will turn black, and show a Critical error message. Agent: Don't worry, this is normal. Agent: 8 Agent: Tap the check mark icon at the bottom of the screen to reset your eReader. Agent: You'll see a Restoring message on the screen. Customer: Despite clicking on the button for a long time, it never completely turns off the screen, always staying with the da Conceição logo. Customer: Never gets black or gives any other image. Agent: Ok, we can try one more thing Agent: Please follow these steps Agent: 1 Agent: Connect your eReader to a power source by doing one of the following: Agent: • Turn on your computer and connect the included USB power cord to your computer first, and then your eReader. Agent: • Plug the wall charger (not included) to a power outlet, and then connect your eReader to the wall charger. Agent: 2 Agent: Press and hold the power button until you see the words "Powered off" at the top of the screen. Agent: 3 Agent: Release the power button. Agent: 4 Agent: Press and hold the power button on your eReader for 30 seconds. Agent: 5 Agent: Wait for the 'Restore' screen to appear. Agent: 6 Agent: Release the power button Customer: When I let go of the button the only thing it does is flash the button light, the screen turns on and... nothing happens... Customer: At this moment it is connected to the computer's USB port and I am pressing the H+ button for more than a minute and nothing happens. Agent: Thanks a lot Something else you could try is put it to charge for at least 3 hours trying a different cable, or a different power source Agent: Unfortunately da Conceição has no repair centers or services. Agent: At this point the options are that if possible, you take it to an external repair center of electronic in your area, or also if you are interested in buying a new one we can gladly provide you a discount Customer: OK.
