en: Customer: How to make da Mata S.A. glo sync/configure with computer? Customer: isaacpereira@ig.com.br Customer: I do not remember, he was saved, but I bought eme el 611 Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: Have you ever sync your eReader with your computer before? Customer: Had to reset the da Mata S.A., and now it does not configure by computer or WIFI. Customer: In the WIFI connection it starts and after the error comes. Customer: But on the computer it only loads. Customer: I installed da Mata S.A. desktop and it does not recognize da Mata S.A. Agent: So is the first time you have this issue with your eREader? Customer: It Customer: worked perfectly before. Agent: Did you tried with another USB cable and plug in with another USB port? Customer: Yes, I tried on all 6 ports and on an old notebook. Customer: It only loads Customer: and I switched the cable also. Customer: When I put on the computer it asks to download the da Mata S.A. desktop. Customer: It just doesn't recognize it. Agent: well we can try a factory reset Customer: Tried now on desktop, made up a new account and he asks to connect the cable, changed port and continues this error. Customer: How do I do this factory reset? Agent: If you perform a factory reset on your eReader, you'll: Agent: Remove all books from your eReader. Agent: Any books you purchased from da Mata S.A. can be re-downloaded from the da Mata S.A. after a factory reset. Agent: Lose any bookmarks and annotations you've made in your books since you last synced your eReader. Agent: Sign out of your account on your eReader. Agent: Reset all personalized settings and preferences. Agent: Return your eReader to its original settings. Agent: If possible, back up any books or documents that you added to your eReader using da Mata S.A., or that you manually added using your computer. Agent: You do not need to back up any books you bought from da Mata S.A.. Agent: Any books you purchased from da Mata S.A. can be re-downloaded from the da Mata S.A. Cloud after a factory reset. Agent: Go to your Home screen. Agent: Tap Home at the top of the screen. Agent: Tap Settings. Agent: Tap Device information. Agent: Tap Factory reset under Advanced. Agent: Tap Reset Now. Customer: Visitor uploaded: da Mata S.A. Customer: URL: https://www.das.br/ Customer: Type: Image/png Customer: Size: 611 Customer: It doesn't get out of this screen: Customer: Visitor uploaded: da Mata S.A.-Image-2021-02-22-at-15.37.21.jpeg Customer: Url: https://www.das.br/ Customer: Type: Image/jpeg Customer: Size: 611 Customer: If I return to the screen it asks to choose the language. Customer: There's no way I do the reset like this. Agent: well lets try a manual reset Agent: I going to share the steps Customer: OK. Agent: Connect your eReader to a power source by doing one of the following: Agent: Turn on your computer and connect the included USB power cord to your computer first, and then your eReader. Agent: Plug the wall charger (not included) to a power outlet, and then connect your eReader to the wall charger. Agent: Press and hold the power button until the power light on the top-right corner of your eReader turns off. Agent: You'll see a 'Powered off' screen when your eReader is turned off. Agent: Release the power button. Agent: Press and hold the power button on your eReader for 30 seconds. Agent: Wait for the Restore screen to appear. Agent: Release the power button. Agent: Your eReader screen will turn black and begin the restoring process. Agent: After the restoring process finishes, follow the onscreen instructions to set up your eReader. Agent: You'll need access to an active Wi Fi or internet connection to complete setup. Agent: You can also use the da Mata S.A. app to set up your eReader using your computer. Agent: Could you get the manual factory reset? Customer: Then it is on this screen to set up and continues giving network error and connecting in the micro only to load. Agent: Can you tell me where did you bought your eReader? Agent: In da Mata S.A.? Customer: Sra. Nina da Mata Customer: In 611 Agent: Well unfortunately, your da Mata S.A. won't work any more, and the warranty is over for your da Mata S.A.. Agent: It should to react after the factory reset. Customer: The worst part is that it is not, I even tried putting the clip in the little reset hole. Customer: And freezes on the same screen. Customer: But thank you for the help, I will continue looking for some solution. Agent: I'm really sorry we couldn't solve the issue with your da Mata S.A. Agent: Is there anything else I can help you with? Customer: OK. That's all right. Customer: Thank you.

Customer: Costela Agent: Thank you very much for the information. Agent: Are you using our Costela App in an Android device or in an iOS device? Agent: In the Costela App, if you go to "More>Settings", can you find exactly the same email address you provided me above? Agent: Or it is different? Customer: IT'S ANOTHER Costela. Customer: heitornascimento@uol.com.br Agent: Thank you very much. Agent: Okay, this seems to be the source of the problem. Agent: Due to you are not using the exact same account you used to make the purchase, it is not possible for you to see the full eBook because it is not in that account. Agent: In the account you have in the App, probably you only have the eBook sample at this moment. Agent: Just to verify the account you have in the App, can you provide me the title of any other eBook you have there, please? Customer: Lupa da Alma, O Fim do Alzeimer, Nietzech Hoje Agent: Thank you so much for the verification! Agent: Don't worry, now that the account is verified, I could transfer the eBook from the account you used to purchase to the account you are using in the App with no problems! Agent: In that way, the full eBook will be available there. Agent: Is it okay for you if we do this? Customer: Sure. Customer: But what about future purchases? Will this problem happen again? Agent: Only if you use the wrong account. Agent: In the future, you would need to use exactly the same account you have in the App to purchase more eBooks, in that way they will be saved there and you will immediately see them. Agent: If you purchase the eBooks in the other account, I'm afraid the same problem will happen. Customer: Thank you for your guidance Agent: You're welcome, Daniel Mendes! Agent: It is a pleasure to help you. Agent: I just deleted the sample of your account to add the full eBook. Agent: Can you help me sync your Costela App just so the sample can disappear first, please? Customer: How do I do it? Agent: No problem! Agent: In the App, if you go to the home page, there should be an icon at the top that looks like a spinning circle or arrow. Agent: Can you see it? Customer: Yes Agent: Great! Agent: Please, tap that icon to begin the sync. Agent: Once it is complete, please let me know if the sample is gone. Customer: I tapped the icon Agent: Thank you! Agent: What can you see in the App after that? Customer: The book I bought is no longer there Customer: Can I put it back in the library? Agent: Great! Agent: That means the sample is gone. Agent: I will now transfer the full eBook. Agent: Please, just allow me a moment to do this. Customer: OK, I'll wait Agent: Thank you for your patience, Daniel Mendes! Agent: I successfully transferred the eBook to the account you use in the App. Agent: Please, sync your Costela App and the full eBook should download after that. Customer: Perfect! It worked. Customer: Thank you so much for the attention and have an excellent working day Agent: Thank you so much! Agent: It has been a pleasure to help you and I wish you enjoy your reading! Agent: Have a lovely day, too! Agent: Thank you for your time and kindness, Daniel Mendes.

en: Customer: My Nascimento has been reset, and the purchased books are gone (except for one), as well as the PDF files. Customer: How to solve this? Customer: Good Morning! Customer: The e-mail is catarinada-conceicao@cavalcanti.br Agent: For security purposes, can you please confirm either the date of your most recent purchase or the title of one of the ebooks/audiobooks in your account? Customer: Yes! Customer: SAPIENS, order number +55 (011) 9375-7155 Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: Nice to meet you, Sra. Rebeca Campos. Agent: I hope you are having a great day! Agent: Please, allow me a few minutes to find your account. Customer: OK, have a great day! Customer: There is another email, where the receipt for this order above was sent: catarinada-conceicao@cavalcanti.br Agent: Thank you for letting me know. Agent: Just allow me a moment to verify if there is another account with the second email address, too. Agent: Thank you for your patience! Agent: Indeed, I was able to find 2 accounts using each email address. Agent: Just to verify both accounts, can you provide me your postal code, please? Customer: +55 (011) 9375-7155 Agent: Thank you for the verification, Sra. Rebeca Campos! Agent: Due to you have 2 accounts, I believe you were using the account associated with the second email address before the eReader was rebooted, I can see 3 eBooks there. Agent: Do you know what Nascimento model you have? Customer: A moment, please Agent: Sure, thank you! Agent: You can usually find the model or the serial number if you go to More>Settings>Device information, in the eReader. Customer: I'm kind of confused, but it's Nascimento, which I found in "About Nascimento" Agent: Thank you so much, Sra. Rebeca Campos. Agent: In the eReader, under Settings, can you also see an option that says "Accounts"? Customer: I found it Agent: Great! Agent: If you access to that option, what is the email address you can see there? Customer: catarinada-conceicao@cavalcanti.br Agent: Thank you so much! Agent: Indeed, it seems you are not using the account with the other 3 eBooks you purchased and that is why you cannot see them. Agent: Due to this, what you can do to use the correct account is to sign out of the Nascimento account you are using and then sign back in using the Nascimento login option and the second email address you provided me. Agent: After you do that, the 3 eBooks will download there. Customer: Here we go: 1. How do I log out of the Nascimento account, and where: on the Nascimento, or the computer? Customer: 2. How do I sign in with the new email? Customer: I apologise; I am not tech-savvy. Agent: Don't worry about it, Sra. Rebeca Campos! Agent: It is a pleasure to help you. Agent: First than all, is your eReader connected to the WiFi at the moment? Agent: Or did you set up the eReader the last time using a computer with our Nascimento App? Customer: I'm connected to Wi-Fi, but I don't know where I set it up, although I think it's easier on the computer. Agent: Thank you for confirm this to me! Agent: In that case, you can sign out of your account if you follow these steps: Agent: 1 Agent: Go to your Home screen. Agent: 2 Agent: Tap the More icon at the bottom of the screen. Agent: 3 Agent: Tap Settings. Agent: 4 Agent: Tap Accounts. Agent: 5 Agent: Under Nascimento, tap Sign out. Agent: A confirmation screen will appear. Agent: 6 Agent: Tap Sign out. Agent: After you sign out, follow the onscreen instructions to set up your eReader. Agent: Once you do this, you will arrive to the set up and you need to complete it. Agent: There, you will have the option to connect your WiFi again and then sign into the correct account. . Agent: You will also have the option to set up using the computer and if you chose this, you need to make sure that you are using the second Nascimento account in the Desktop App first and then you can connect the eReader to the computer and allow the App to complete the set up. Agent: Please, let me know which option is better for you. Customer: I am setting up by Nascimento Customer: Then I get to a page that says: Log in with your account or Create a Nascimento account. Agent: Thank you! Agent: In that page, please select "Log in with your account" and then select an option that says "Continue with Nascimento". Agent: If you cannot see it at first, please select an option that says "More sign in options" and it should be visible there. Customer: Yes, it is visible but clicking does not happen anything. Agent: Nothing happens at all after you click? Agent: Or do you were able to see the sign in page again after you selected it? Customer: Now I came back. Customer: Since the network went down, I don't know if you are on line.

pt_br: Cliente: Queria saber dos planos Agente: Fico tão feliz em saber que você está interessado em se juntar a da Rosa! Agente: Fico feliz em explicar um pouco mais sobre como o da Rosa funciona. Agente: da Rosa é um serviço de assinatura mensal que oferece acesso à maior rede fitness do mundo. Agente: Nós somos parceiros de mais de 20.000 estúdios em cidades em todo o mundo para oferecer aulas pessoais e por transmissão ao vivo. Agente: Cada mês você receberá um certo número de créditos para usar: o número de aulas que você pode fazer a cada ciclo depende do plano de assinatura, e você escolhe como usar seu créditos. Agente: Você pode reservar aulas que variam de ioga a Barre a ciclismo e artes marciais. Agente: Em muitas cidades, também há opções de bem-estar como massagens ou cabeleireiros! Agente: Ao se inscrever, você também terá acesso à nossa academia de vídeo sob demanda. Agente: Isso está incluído na sua assinatura e há uma enorme quantidade de vídeos disponíveis. Agente: Então, se você deseja experimentar um novo tipo de treino ou só quiser participar de um treino em casa, eu incentivo você a verificá-lo. Agente: Algumas dicas para você começar a utilizar o da Rosa: Agente: Quando você se inscreve, sua assinatura começa naquele dia. Agente: Seu assinatura será renovada automaticamente todos os meses nessa data. Agente: Para ver os estúdios perto de você, consulte a página de pesquisa. Agente: Basta clicar nos links de cada estúdio para acessar os horários! Agente: Em nosso site, você também poderá assistir às aulas por transmissão ao vivo que muitos estúdios oferecem. Agente: Você poderá reservar aulas através do nosso site ou app. Agente: O estúdio receberá automaticamente sua solicitação e reservará um vaga. Agente: Se você não conseguir, cancele com pelo menos 12 horas de antecedência para evitar taxas. Agente: Certifique-se de verificar o nosso Centro de Ajuda para obter mais informações sobre como o da Rosa funciona. Agente: Se você tiver alguma dúvida, me avise! Agente: Prazer em esclarecer aqui! Agente: Você não terá acesso aos preços de créditos da aula sem uma assinatura ativa, mas, para ter uma ideia de como nosso sistema funciona, o número de créditos necessários para reservar uma aula é ajustado com base no horário em que você está reservando, em qual estúdio você está visitando e a que horas é a sua aula. Agente: Embora não possamos fornecer um número definitivo agora, se houver um estúdio específico que você esteja interessado em visitar, podemos oferecer a você uma ideia do número de créditos para cada aula. Agente: Lembre-se de que as aulas mudam dinamicamente e em tempo real!
en: Customer: I want to know about the plans. Agent: I'm so glad to hear you're interested in joining da Rosa! Agent: I'm happy to explain a little more about how da Rosa works. Agent: da Rosa is a monthly subscription service which provides access to the world’s largest fitness network. Agent: We partner with over 20,000 studios in cities all over the world to offer both in-person classes as well as livestream options. Agent: Each month you get a certain number of credits to use: the number of classes you can take each cycle depends on your membership plan, and you choose how to use your credits. Agent: You can book classes ranging from yoga to barre to cycling to martial arts. Agent: In many cities, there are also wellness options like massages or haircuts! Agent: When you sign up, you'll also have access to our video on-demand library. Agent: This is included in your membership, and there are tons of videos available. Agent: So if you are wanting to try out a new type of workout or just want to get in a workout at home, I encourage you to check those out. Agent: A few tips to get you up and running da Rosa: Agent: When you sign up, your membership starts that day. Agent: Your membership will auto-renew every month on that date. Agent: To see the studios near you, check out the search page. Agent: Just click through the individual studio links to access their schedules! Agent: On our website, you'll also be able to see the livestream classes many studios offer. Agent: You'll be able to book classes through our website or app. Agent: The studio will automatically receive your request and save you a spot. Agent: If you can't make it, just be sure to cancel at least 12 hours in advance to avoid fees. Agent: Be sure to check out our Help Center for more information about how da Rosa works. Agent: If you have any questions, let me know. Agent: Happy to clarify here! Agent: You won't have access to class credit pricing without an active membership, but to give you an idea of how our system works, the number of credits needed to book a class is adjusted based on the time you’re booking, what studio you’re visiting, and what time your class is. Agent: While we’re not able to provide a definitive number right now, if there’s a particular studio you’re interested in visiting, we can give you a range of how many credits each class could be. Agent: Just keep in mind that classes do change dynamically and in real time!

Agent: While I’m unable to retroactively cancel your account, what I can do is apply a monetary credit to your membership in the amount of R$567 for your 3 unused months of membership. Agent: This monetary credit will automatically apply towards your next monthly membership charge on January 26, and will continue to cover subsequent monthly membership charges until it is used in full. Agent: You can expect this refund to arrive in 5-7 days depending on your bank/carrier, and you won't be charged again moving forward. Agent: In the meantime, you can view the refunded charge on the billing page in your Account Settings. Agent: Please let me know if you have any other questions or if there is anything else that I can help with. en: Customer: Good morning. Customer: I received a Ramos Ltda. charge after the trial period Customer: I am fine Customer: Ramos Ltda. charged me after the trial period. Customer: OK Agent: It looks like you created a membership on January . Agent: Since we did not receive an account cancellation request prior to today, you then renewed onto a full-priced monthly membership plan starting February 14, per the terms of your promotional offer. Agent: Ramos Ltda. is a subscription service that auto-renews each month, which is why your payment method on file was charged. Agent: We strive to make this process clear during sign-up and in our confirmation emails, and I’m sorry that wasn’t the case here. Agent: I understand how frustrating it is to be charged for a service you aren't actively using, so I’m happy to help resolve this as best I can. Agent: Option #1 - Pause your membership for one billing cycle and receive a R$189 refund. Agent: You’ll still have access to 75214 credits. Agent: Option #2 - Submit an account cancellation request for the end of your current billing cycle and have access to your 75214 credits until March 13. Agent: Option #3 - Immediately cancel your membership and receive a  R$189 refund for the unused credits from your latest paid billing cycle. Agent: Let me know if you have any questions or concerns about any of these options. Customer: Option 3 Customer: I tried to cancel it through the app, but it is showing an error Agent: No worries Agent: Let me process it for you Customer: In this case, will you refund the 75214 on my invoice? Customer: How do I change the plan to 75214 BRL? Customer: Please, I would like a refund for the 75214 and use the 99 BRL plan. Agent: You can changed the plan on your Membership setting Customer: It is showing an error Agent: But regarding the options I gave you you choose #3 so I will be cancelling the account immediately Customer: Do you offer phone support? Agent: Do you confirm of this?
